step.datasource:
INSERT INTO [PPG_TRANSFER].[dbo].[DELETE_ORDERS_TO_KARDEX]([STATUS] ,[ORDERNR],[DIRECTION], [OH_INFO1],[SYSMODIFIED],[SYSCREATED])
SELECT 10 AS STATUS, 'COUNT_' + FORMAT(DATEADD(DAY, -1, GETDATE()), 'yyMMdd') AS ORDERNR, 3 AS DIRECTION, 'Counting' AS OH_INFO1, GETDATE() AS SYSMODIFIED, GETDATE() AS SYSCREATED

INSERT INTO [PPG_TRANSFER].[dbo].[COUNT_TO_KARDEX]([STATUS] ,[ORDERNR],[LINE],[ARTICLE],[OL_INFO1],[OL_INFO2],[OL_INFO3],[SYSMODIFIED],[SYSCREATED])
SELECT 0 AS STATUS, 'COUNT_' + FORMAT(GETDATE(), 'yyMMdd') AS ORDERNR, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY i.ItemCode) AS LINE, i.ItemCode AS ARTICLE, LEFT(i.Description, 50) AS OL_INFO1, v.CountingCycle AS OL_INFO2, MAX(g.datum) AS OL_INFO3, GETDATE() AS SYSMODIFIED, GETDATE() AS SYSCREATED FROM [400]..Items i WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT OUTER JOIN [400]..gbkmut g WITH (NOLOCK) ON i.itemcode = g.artcode AND g.transsubtype = 'G' AND g.transtype = 'N' AND g.warehouse = '1' AND g.datum > DATEADD(YEAR, -2, GETDATE()) AND g.type = 190 LEFT OUTER JOIN [400]..voorrd v WITH (NOLOCK) ON v.artcode = i.ItemCode and magcode = '1' WHERE 1=1 AND i.class_10 = '10.00' AND v.magcode = '1' AND v.CountingCycle > 0 AND i.UserNumber_11 IN (2,12) AND i.condition NOT IN ('B','E') GROUP BY i.ItemCode, i.Description, v.CountingCycle HAVING (MAX(g.datum) IS NULL OR DATEADD (DAY,v.CountingCycle, MAX(g.datum)) <= GETDATE()) ORDER BY i.ItemCode

INSERT INTO [PPG_TRANSFER].[dbo].[DELETE_ORDERS_TO_KARDEX]([STATUS],[ORDERNR],[DIRECTION],[OH_INFO1],[OH_INFO2],[OH_INFO3],[OH_INFO4],[OH_INFO5],[SYSMODIFIED],[SYSCREATED]) SELECT DISTINCT 10 AS STATUS, ORDERNR, DIRECTION, OH_INFO1, OH_INFO2, OH_INFO3, OH_INFO4, o.SYSCREATED AS [OH_INFO5], GETDATE() AS SYSMODIFIED, GETDATE() AS SYSCREATED FROM [PPG_TRANSFER].[dbo].[ORDERS_TO_KARDEX] o WHERE (DATEDIFF(DAY, o.SYSCREATED, GETDATE()) = 30) OR (( OH_INFO1 = 'Production Order' OR OH_INFO1 = 'Sales Order') AND CONVERT(DATE, o.SYSCREATED) = CONVERT(DATE, DATEADD(DAY, -1, GETDATE()))) ORDER BY ORDERNR

SELECT 'Counting' AS Element, ID, ORDERNR, OH_INFO1, OH_INFO2, ARTICLE, OL_INFO1, ERROR_DATE, ERROR_MESSAGE, SYSMODIFIED from [PPG_TRANSFER].[dbo].COUNT_TO_KARDEX WHERE STATUS = 3 AND CONVERT(DATE,SYSCREATED) = CONVERT(DATE, DATEADD(DAY, -1, GETDATE())) UNION SELECT 'Material' AS Element, ID, '' AS ORDERNR, '' AS OH_INFO1, '' AS OH_INFO2, ARTICLE, DESCRIPTION_1, ERROR_DATE, ERROR_MESSAGE, SYSMODIFIED from [PPG_TRANSFER].[dbo].MATERIALS_TO_KARDEX WHERE STATUS = 3 AND CONVERT(DATE,SYSCREATED) = CONVERT(DATE, DATEADD(DAY, -1, GETDATE())) UNION SELECT 'Orders' AS Element, ID, ORDERNR, OH_INFO1, OH_INFO2, ARTICLE, OL_INFO1, ERROR_DATE, ERROR_MESSAGE, SYSMODIFIED from [PPG_TRANSFER].[dbo].ORDERS_TO_KARDEX WHERE STATUS = 3 AND CONVERT(DATE,SYSCREATED) = CONVERT(DATE, DATEADD(DAY, -1, GETDATE())) UNION SELECT 'Delete Orders' AS Element, ID, ORDERNR, OH_INFO1, OH_INFO2, '' AS ARTICLE, '' AS OL_INFO1, ERROR_DATE, ERROR_MESSAGE, SYSMODIFIED from [PPG_TRANSFER].[dbo].DELETE_ORDERS_TO_KARDEX WHERE STATUS = 13 AND CONVERT(DATE,SYSCREATED) = CONVERT(DATE, DATEADD(DAY, -1, GETDATE()))
step.contentbody:
Hi,

This are the errors in yesterdays Kardex synchronisation runs.

%Element%%ID%%ORDERNR%%OH_INFO1%%OH_INFO2%%ARTICLE%%OL_INFO1%%ERROR_DATE%%ERROR_MESSAGE%%SYSMODIFIED%
